title: Pixel 3a friend promo code not working
content: Google sent me a$50 promo code to give to a friend if they bought a pixel 3a. Someone used it, so they sent me another one, Simone use that one, so they send me another one. Iâ€™m now at $1k google play bucks. However my last code said it was already redeemed and there was not a new one sent to me. How do I fix this????
